page.title: 04continued...
page.content: {Other rooms}in an average country house are 3 bedrooms,bathroom,living room and sometimes a{sitting room which contains the best furniture and is only used for visitors.If there is no{utility room}a washing machine and tumble drier will be in the kitchen.A freezer is usually kept in the garage. In{bedrooms }wall fitted units are replacing bedroom suites{.Living rooms also have some wall units and most houses have fitted carpets.Continental quilts are gradually replacing woollen blankets and a bed spread.Coloured bed linen is used.Most people use a digital clock radio to waken them. Only two houses in the area do not have a television and nearly all the houses have a telephone.All houses have a radio and 75% own a recorder or music centre.About 25% have home computers.
